title: Business optimism drives higher real i rate

content.question: If businesses become optimistic about the profitability of investments in an economy, which of the following will happen in the loanable funds market in the short run?

choices.label: The supply and demand for loanable funds will increase.
The supply and demand for loanable funds will decrease.
The demand for loanable funds by the private sector will decrease.
The real interest rate will increase.
The real interest rate will decrease.

content.answer: The real interest rate will increase.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
